values: Deconstructing the Faith (2) Recovering from our Epidemic of Anxiety

The second of four talks on Deconstruction given by Pastor Jeffery at Reformation Covenant Church in Oregon City, OR, in June of 2024. Title: Reconstructing the Soul: Recovering from our Epidemic of Anxiety
